00902 
00903 typedef void ErrorCallbackFunction(MeshError *error);
00904 
00905 enum DefaultActions
00906 {
00907     silent=0,
00908     printErrors,
00909     abortOnErrors
00910 };
00911

00914   void MeshError_SetDefaultAction(MeshError *error, const DefaultActions action );
00915 
00916   void MeshError_GetDefaultAction(MeshError *error, DefaultActions *action);
00917  
00918   /* return 1 if there is no error */
00919   int MeshError_OK(MeshError *error);
